extendedInfo.description: In the game depending on troops you can compete for territories such as lands,cities and oceans,further for resources,develop economy and military,conquer enemies' capitals and destory the enemies. There are 28 European countries including more than 200 land and sea areas,you can choose 12 countries from the Axis Powers and the Allies while enjoying kinds of game modes.During the game you need to operate and distribute the three basic troops which include soldiers,tanks and artillery. â Soldier troops with high yields but general attackâ Tank troops with high attack and continue action when complete destroying the enemiesâ Artillery troop attacks soldier troop and tank troop while they cannot strike backJudge the current situation correctly at any time for the AI is outstanding. The attributes of arms are different for each country. For example,the tank of Germany is most powerful but with high price, the soldier of Soviet Union is cheapest, the navy of Britain is best.In the game you need to use military cards to operate the battle. - Soldier Card (produce soldier troops) - Tank Card (produce tank troops) - Artillery Card (produce artillery troops) - Battleship Card (take actions on the sea ) - Fortress Card (cannot move and attack during 3 rounds but improve defending) - Construction Card (construct territories,improve taxes, highest level can draft army troop ) - Airstrike Card (Air attack the enemy of adjacent territory) - General Card(equip a general to the troop for enhancing the attacking power) - Marshal Card(equip a marshal to the troop for enhancing the defending power) - Special Card (only owned by Germany,Soviet Union,Britain,France,Italy and used once every 7 rounds.)âââTwo modes: Conquest mode and Battle mode ââââ Conquest mode: Choose one country from the 11 Axis and Allies which may change the fate of the world to dominate the world. The others will be your allies, enemies and neutral. There are 3 periods to choose from:1940 the beginning WWâ¡,1942 the middle WWâ¡, 1944 the end WWâ¡.â Battle mode: 10 great battles which may change the fate of the world are waiting for your challenge!â 1942 Pacific War â 1943 China Burma India Theater â 1942 The Battle of Kursk â 1944 D-Day in Normandy â 1941 North African Campaign â 1942 Kokoda Campaign â 1945 The Fate of Reich â 1945 August Storm â 1942 Compete for Indian Ocean â 1940 Sea Road--------------------------------------------------Get the inside connection on PlayPhone games:â¨Like us on Facebook:â¨http://www.facebook.com/PlayPhoneGamesâ¨Follow us on Twitter:â¨http://www.twitter.com/PlayPhoneâ¨Check out our YouTube videos:â¨http://www.youtube.com/PlayPhoneTVâ¨Visit our website:â¨http://www.PlayPhone.com

reviews.title: Has good potential...
reviews.comment: But touch control is misplaced, English is bad, and the map needs better navigation, maybe zooming. Wasn\'t able to get to evaluate game mechanics itself.

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: Purchased full and nothing changed, every time I capture a capital, axis or allies, I get a failure screen with the flag of the county I captured, then it sayies to quit or buy full which I already have, really needs to be fixed. Game itself is great.
